<properties pageTitle="780b09de-d600-47df-ae1c-aecab8322804" description="6befdefb-a84a-49c2-bf96-91b0319af941" services="service-bus" documentationCenter=".net" authors="sethmanheim" manager="timlt" editor=""/>
<tags ms.service="service-bus" ms.workload="tbd" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="06/18/2015" ms.author="sethm"/>

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: $sbr = Get-AzureSBAuthorizationRule -Namespace $Namespace # Create the NamespaceManager object to create the event hub Write-Output "Creating a NamespaceManager object for the [$Namespace] namespace..." $NamespaceManager = [Microsoft.ServiceBus.NamespaceManager]::CreateFromConnectionString($sbr.ConnectionString); Write-Output "NamespaceManager object for the [$Namespace] namespace has been successfully created."

LinkItem.internal_link_text: How to create Service Bus queues, topics and subscriptions using a PowerShell script
